item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Kevin. I’ve been into programming for about 8 years. I’m mostly self-taught and I started off by making WordPress websites for a small web agency. Right now, I’m working as an IT web developer for Ubisoft. I love spending time on personal projects outside of that, too. Check out my post detailing some of those. Some languages/technologies I’m familiar with and enjoy using include Go, C, TypeScript, React and WebAssembly.
